dt-option.name: language.stateRestore.removeConfirm
dt-option.summary: Set the confirmation message shown within the StateRestore remove modal

type.description: The string that will be displayed within the remove modal to confirm that a user wants to remove this state.

default.value: Are you sure you want to remove %s?

dt-option.description: This string is displayed within the remove modal to confirm that a user wants to remove this state. The %s token will be replaced with the name of the state that is being removed.

example.title: Change text within remove confirmation modal
